## FacadeModules type

\*

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type FacadeModules<F extends Facade, R extends string> = {
    [K in Exclude<keyof F, R>]: Pick<F[K], 'name' | 'actions' | 'actionNames'>;
};
```
